name: Frog Pinball
description:
Frog Pinball was made for Mini Jam 79: Frogs. https://itch.io/jam/mini-jam-79-frogs

It's a pinball game with a frog. Pull back the frog's tongue by holding space and release to strike the ball. Left paddle is controlled with A or Q while right paddle is controlled with D, E, or P. Bounce the ball off mushrooms to score points.
